column5: Plan to hit Niagara in the morn. Have room for two.Leave Richmond Hill 5:30am. Anyone interested.
don't think I've ever heard my wife tell me that...some guys have all the luck lol and have a great day !
from shore or from a boat
Imagine a boat.. Joey's having a street hockey tourney in the laneway tomorrow!  Wish I could join you Paul.. not in the cards with the current schedule!
Or she moving me out while I`m gone.

No, just not feeling up to snuff these days.  Great opportunity for anyone interested, they can even used my gear.  We have roe and minnows from last week already and I'm already tied up with two rods and some extra three ways.  Don't pass it up if you've never been!!!!
Okay, spots are filled, thanks for your participaction
You guys are always so generous. I remember being a bit of a noob on OFC and getting the invite.  One day guys. PS.  Joey you need to talk to my wife and tell her to tell me to go fishing. lol
Chris, you've got an open invite in my boat anytime!
Grr. I wish I was I town guys.   The niagara is my nemisis. Fished It time and time again with nothing but white stripes
Paul, wherever you are, pickup a case of beer on the way home. You're outta beer.
Thanks Bill.  I stil have my boat too, it is just a wakeboard/tubing/cruising boat with a fishing platform, bow mount trolling motor and livewell. For the time being.
Oh Yea!  Couple of Steaks for the BBQ!!  I shoulda checked the board Sat afternoon!  Rick

Paul you should know better Joey would never kick you out when your gone with the boat    That is her's and she will use it to move all her tackle if that day were to come. Your safe when she tells you to go fishing alone just worry when she sends you carp fishing for a weekend from shore.
Well if it is Joey and the boat with fishing tackle, boy did you get the perfect wife Paul...   Very nice fish too glad you caught dinner and looks like possible a few sandwiches for lunch too.   Art
